.gitignore:
# Stack
.stack-work/
stack.yaml.lock

# Cabal
dist/
dist-*/
cabal-dev/
.cabal-sandbox/
cabal.sandbox.config
cabal.config
*.prof
*.aux
*.hp
*.eventlog

# GHC
*.o
*.hi
*.chi
*.chs.h
*.dyn_o
*.dyn_hi

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
app/Main.hs:
module Main where

import Data.Data
import Tool.Tool

main :: IO ()
main = do
    putStrLn "Hello, World!"
src/Data/Data.hs:
module Data.Data where

-- Your data module
src/Tool/Tool.hs:
module Tool.Tool where

-- Your tool module
package.yaml:
name: project
version: 1.0.0
github: "user/project"
license: BSD3
author: "Quitto"
maintainer: "your.email@example.com"

dependencies:
- base >= 4.7 && < 5

library:
  source-dirs: src

executables:
  project-exe:
    main: Main.hs
    source-dirs: app
    ghc-options:
    - -threaded
    - -rtsopts
    - -with-rtsopts=-N
    dependencies:
    - project
